item.title: Laureen add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "I think there should be a rule that everyone in the world should get a standing ovation at least once in their lives." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Laureen add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Kinder than is <i>necessary</i>. Because it's not enough to be kind. One should be kinder than needed." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Laureen add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "Knowing can be a curse on a person's life. I'd traded in a pack of lies for a pack of truth, and I didn't know which one was heavier. Which one took the most strength to carry around? It was a ridiculous question, though, because once you know the truth, you can't ever go back and pick up your suitcase of lies. Heavier or not, the truth is yours now." -- Sue Monk Kidd
